subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] More on Parallel systems
msgSnippet: If you look at the cheat sheets for ThumbScript, you ll see the written representation. The characters are ambiguous unless you show the dot locations as
messageBody:
If you look at the 'cheat sheets' for ThumbScript,
you'll see the written representation. The
'characters' are ambiguous unless you show the dot
locations as well as the strokes; and even worse, most
of the characters can be reverse-stroked, for numbers
and symbols.

I only made the ThumbScript and Moon Symbol
suggestions to stimulate thinking outside the 2x3
Braille box, which I believe to be too confining.

NB: This is only a knee-jerk opinion, I haven't
investigated the matter at all thoroughly.
===========
Short sig.

===========
Short sig.
